operation.name: insert
operation.sql:
insert into topic_author ( create_time , update_time , delete_flag author_id loginname avatar_url ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , 0 ? ? ? )
select if((#authorId# is null) ,CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s%f'),LPAD(ROUND(RAND()*100000000),8,'0')) ,#authorId# ) as authorId

operation.name: delete
operation.sql: UPDATE topic_author SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0 and author_id = ?

operation.name: deleteByLoginname
operation.sql: UPDATE topic_author SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0 and loginname = ?

operation.name: update
operation.sql:
UPDATE topic_author SET update_time= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6)
loginname = ?
avatar_url = ?
where delete_flag = 0 and author_id = ?

operation.name: getTopicAuthorByAuthorId
operation.sql: select a.author_id, a.loginname, a.avatar_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_author a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.author_id = ?

operation.name: getTopicAuthorByLoginname
operation.sql: select a.author_id, a.loginname, a.avatar_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_author a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.loginname = ?

operation.name: getTopicAuthorPageListByDefaultQuery
operation.sql:
select a.author_id, a.loginname, a.avatar_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_author a where a.delete_flag = 0
a.author_id=?
a.author_id in
#authorIds[]#
a.loginname like CONCAT('%',#loginnameLike#,'%')
a.avatar_url like CONCAT('%',#avatarUrlLike#,'%')
a.create_time >=#createTimeMin#
a.create_time <#createTimeMax#
a.update_time >=#updateTimeMin#
a.update_time <#updateTimeMax#
and 0 = 1

operation.name: getTopicAuthorsByAuthorIds
operation.sql:
select a.author_id, a.loginname, a.avatar_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_author a where a.delete_flag = 0
1=0
a.author_id in
#authorIds[]#

operation.name: getTopicAuthorsByLoginnames
operation.sql:
select a.author_id, a.loginname, a.avatar_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_author a where a.delete_flag = 0
1=0
a.loginname in
#loginnames[]#

operation.name: deleteByAuthorIds
operation.sql:
UPDATE topic_author SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0
1=0
author_id in
#authorIds[]#

operation.name: deleteByLoginnames
operation.sql:
UPDATE topic_author SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0
1=0
loginname in
#loginnames[]#
